name: Doki Doki On Air2
overview: Doki Doki on Air 2: The industry's first radio program production simulation game Dokidoki on Air got a sequel. In this game some of the voices are from Junko Iwao, Yuko Nagashima, Yoshiko Yokoyama, Mami Komori, Chisa Yokoyama. Noriko Kuwashima, Yuka Imai, Takehito Koyasu, Masahito Suzuki, Kyoko Egami, Satoru Akahori . The purpose of this new game is to become a director of Culture Broadcasting, that means, to direct the broadcast of one course (13 weeks) from October to December, and to cultivate popular programs. In order to create a popular program, not only aiming at high listening rate but also trusting relationship with personality and sponsors becomes important. Please also refer to the advice of producer and rival senior director. It depends on your skills whether all of your program will become a popular program that is a sign of Culture Broadcasting, or it will become a program that the people will ignore.
